name: IOU an new beaker
description:
You are a janitor doing your rounds when you accidentally break a container of neuro-toxin while cleaning the chemistry lab. The lock down sequence initiates and next thing you know one of the chemists is trying to help you over the intercom system.

Can you make the counter agent in time.

Note: The ingredients and reactions are procedurally generated. The number of steps required also changes between each playthrough.

Controls:

Left mouse button to pick up or use containers.

Moving the mouse away from center will pan the camera to various parts of the bench.

Right mouse button to zoom in and out of a container.
